text:
Question 03) The residents of Andalsnes, Norway, could afford to live near work on working days and take refuge in the calm of the woods to the weekends. And without leaving the same house. Just find a vacancy to park the property before enjoying the new address.
Once implemented, this proposal would affect the dynamics of urban space by reducing the intensity of the following process:
A) Rural Exodus.
B) Pendular movement.
C) Return migration.
D) seasonal displacement.
E) occupation of central areas.
